backend/AltSignup.mo: Provides a simple signup handler that validates non-empty username and password and returns a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with access control, allowing users to save and retrieve their profiles with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence for removing a specific UI element based on XPath, listing affected files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing routing, pages, styles, and configuration details.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no defined content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, sets Internet Identity configuration into window.process.env, and starts the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Defines alternative Internet Identity origins for allowed authentication domains.
frontend/public/404.html: Fallback page that redirects all unknown routes to index.html for SPA routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with the root layout and routes for signup, login, onboarding, and other app pages.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Provides shared Internet Identity client and login configuration using environment-based II URL and derivation origin.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Renders detailed diagnostics for Internet Identity login state, timing, and stall detection when debugAuth is enabled.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Displays a user-friendly auth error message with optional retry and return-to-landing actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Inline help panel explaining II popup behavior with retry and direct-link actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Displays live auth-flow status, timing, outcomes, and recovery actions with retry and II link.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Shows backend warmup state with warming, ready, and failure UI plus retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handles II #authorize callback and routes to onboarding or main app based on stored onboarding result.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Loads II createOptions before rendering InternetIdentityProvider to ensure safe config initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Wraps routed pages with the OnboardingResultProvider context.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Implements a timer-driven modal for tasks with start, pause, resume, and completion handling.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config wrapper returning dummy values and warning to use proxy client.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Context for storing, hydrating, and persisting onboarding results in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to II identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Manages lifecycle of a user auth attempt with timestamps, correlation ID, and reset controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks auth flow steps, timing, slow-step detection, and terminal outcomes with diagnostic logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Simplified warmup hook that immediately marks readiness when an actor is available, with optional auto-start and retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook managing Internet Identity auth lifecycle, including client creation, login flow, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentitySi: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Mobile-safe II login hook that pre-initializes AuthClient and performs gesture-preserving login with detailed outcome reporting.
Patched mobile II login hook using shared configuration for AuthClient and login options, with gesture-preserving login and structured results.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Password-based identity provider and hook that restores, stores, and manages identities created from username/password credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Timer hook for post-auth phases that tracks elapsed time, triggers timeout callbacks, and supports resetting.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Stall detection hook that monitors auth pipeline steps and flags delays based on step-specific timeouts with diagnostic details.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and a chocolate-themed OKLCH color system, plus base typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy AI client stub that throws an error and is no longer used.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Implements the frontend client for calling the external AI proxy, including request/response types, validation, and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides onboarding storage key and safe JSON parse/stringify helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Daily SweetSteps page that fetches AI‑generated daily tasks and displays loading, error, and task‑interaction states.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Displays hardcoded chocolate inventory stats with period toggles for week, month, and all‑time.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero content, feature slides, and navigation buttons for signup and login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Handles the full Internet Identity login flow with validation, timeouts, diagnostics, and platform-specific logic before redirecting users based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Guides authenticated users through a multi‑step onboarding form, calls an AI API to generate an onboarding plan, and stores the result before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Manages user signup via Internet Identity with validation, timeouts, diagnostics, and redirection once an actor is ready.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Simple backup signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding when authentication succeeds.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the completed onboarding plan to the user and allows navigation back to onboarding if no data is available.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Generates or loads the user’s weekly mountain plan based on onboarding data, caches results per week, and handles errors or onboarding reset.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides correlation IDs and structured console logging for authentication steps, transitions, outcomes, and slow‑step warnings.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates identities by checking anonymity and delegation freshness, and determines whether a session is stale.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and handles storing, restoring, and clearing them in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Chrome on Android and caches platform info for mobile-specific auth behavior.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts arbitrary AI-provided values to displayable strings and offers helpers for validating and extracting string fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, including versions, features, issues, and a pending request to remove a UI element.
